subject: Golf
Scottish Open (Golf)
John Deere Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Henrik Stenson shot a six-under-par 66 to take a two-shot lead into the final round at the Scottish Open. Phil Mickelson (66) was in a group of four in a tie for second.
snippet: Henrik Stenson shot a six-under-par 66 to take a two-shot lead into the final round at the Scottish Open. Phil Mickelson (66) was in a group of four in a tie for second.
